You know, April it's going to be difficult to convince some of those people=
 
 too, can you imagine the look on some of their faces lol when they find =

out how  accurate this all is? lol
 
 
In a message dated 5/20/2009 11:19:=
20 A.M. Eastern Daylight Time,  
april@... writes:=


 
 


=EF=BB=BF  
Science people will tell you there  is no astral. The t=
erm "Astral" was 
coined by the first people who  experienced this realm. B=
ut all words were 
coined. Even words such as dog  or cat. 
 
Also, subcons=
cious means below conscious  or not conscious. So it isn't 
incorrect, thou=
gh maybe some scholarly types  will tell you it isn't proper. 
Again, all w=
ords were coined.
 
You have to remember that colleges and  schools are mos=
tly made up by 
people, people who think only scientifically. I  know-not a=
ll people in colleges 
think this way, but that is what learning  instituti=
ons are based on. They 
reject any term they can't grasp or understand  und=
er a microscope.
 
All this is besides the point  though.
 
 

----- Origin=
al Message -----

The word=
 is really unconscious, the word sub. was coined by  lay people, 
but any p=
sychologist will tell us the word to use is unconscious  because it 
is the=
 correct term, Psych's make a joke about us  lay  people using the word 
su=
bconscious to mean the same thing,  I had 12  credits toward my PhD but, 
t=
il ran out of money.  I understand  what you are saying though, the word 
"=
astral" is also a made up word, as is  many of the new terms out there like=
 
"ascended master" and "channel" I think  they refer to guide and medium, =

respectively. I
